name: Virtua Bird Trainer: The Game
description:
It's been a long time...................Tico

Press Space to play and mash Space to tame Tico.

Press 'F' to toggle fullscreen

"shing" sound effect by RunnerPack

Virtua Bird Trainer via Trash Night Video

Side entry of the Famicase Sketchbook

I played through it fully before uploading and it worked but then someone played it and it got stuck? If that that happens try again I guess?
